sys_hub_flow.description: Create the flow as part of the NeedIt application. Run the flow weekly on Fridays at 11 pm. Get the value of the x_58872_needit.autoCloseOverdue application property to determine how old a task should be to automatically close it. Use the Get Days Ago Date action to calculate the overdue date to compare against due dates. Find open NeedIt Tasks with a Due date older than the number of days set in the property. Update each overdue NeedIt Task with the Handle Overdue NeedIt Tasks subflow. Pass the Number of the NeedIt Task record in the Subflow's Reason input.

sys_hub_flow_snapshot.description: Create the flow as part of the NeedIt application. Run the flow weekly on Fridays at 11 pm. Get the value of the x_58872_needit.autoCloseOverdue application property to determine how old a task should be to automatically close it. Use the Get Days Ago Date action to calculate the overdue date to compare against due dates. Find open NeedIt Tasks with a Due date older than the number of days set in the property. Update each overdue NeedIt Task with the Handle Overdue NeedIt Tasks subflow. Pass the Number of the NeedIt Task record in the Subflow's Reason input.
